Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-65637 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.5-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-65637 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.5-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.7.5-9, affected by CVE-2025-65637
